scripts.update: git submodule foreach git pull origin main
scripts.build: cp -a deploy/. dist/ && cp -r hydra-garden/dist/ dist/garden && cp -r hydra-functions/docs/ dist/api && cp -r hydra-functions/docs/ dist/functions && cp -r hydra-docs/ dist/docs && cp -r hydra-grants/public dist/grants && cp -a hydra/public/. dist/
